query.prompt:
This text is written in Malay. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Tense and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Di tengah-tengah perjalanan hidup kita 9 akan kukatakan hal-hal lain yang kulihat di sana. 28 Setelah aku mengistirahatkan tubuhku yang lelah sejenak, 67 Dia menjawabku: "Bukan manusia, manusia dulu aku,
query.result: | Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Tense | Note | |---|---|---|---|---| | Di | di | preposition | | | | tengah-tengah | tengah | noun | | | | perjalanan | perjalanan | noun | | | | hidup | hidup | noun | | | | kita | kita | pronoun | | | | akan | akan | auxiliary verb | future | | | ku | ku | pronoun | | clitic | | katakan | kata | verb | future | | | hal-hal | hal | noun | | | | lain | lain | adjective | | | | yang | yang | relative pronoun | | | | kulihat | lihat | verb | past | | | di | di | preposition | | | | sana | sana | adverb | | | | Setelah | setelah | conjunction | | | | aku | aku | pronoun | | | | mengistirahatkan | istirahat | verb | past | | | tubuhku | tubuh | noun | | | | yang | yang | relative pronoun | | | | lelah | lelah | adjective | | | | sejenak | sejenak | adverb | | | | Dia | dia | pronoun | | | | menjawabku | jawab | verb | past | | | Bukan | bukan | adverb | | | | manusia | manusia | noun | | | | manusia | manusia | noun | | | | dulu | dulu | adverb | | | | aku | aku | pronoun | | |

query.prompt:

4 Ah, betapa susahnya untuk menceritakan bagaimana keadaannya, 5 hutan yang liar, kasar, dan kuat ini 6 yang memperbarui rasa takut dalam pikiranku!
